programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss (Guy Pearce) uses notes and his own tattoos to track his wife's killer.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Two vigilante brothers try to wipe out Boston's criminal underworld. Willem Dafoe and Norman Reedus star.

programme.title: The Last Waltz
programme.desc: The Band's farewell concert, filmed by Martin Scorsese, features legends like Dylan, Clapton, and Morrison.

programme.title: The Eagles: The Long Road
programme.desc: Un homenaje a la vida y la carrera del cofundador y guitarrista de los Eagles, Glenn Frey.

programme.title: James Brown: The Man, The Music, The Message
programme.desc: The life story of James Brown and how he influenced the world through his music and civic accomplishments.

programme.title: Tina Turner: Simply the Best
programme.desc: The odds were against her, but one day she emerged as Queen of Rock ‘n’ Roll. This is Tina Turner's story.

programme.title: The Notorious B.I.G. Bigger Than Life
programme.desc: Hear the stories about the Notorious B.I.G. from his closest friends and some of the biggest names in hip-hop.

programme.title: Tupac & Biggie: Worlds Collide
programme.desc: Backstage presents the stories of rappers and rivals, Tupac Shakur and Biggie Smalls.

programme.title: Charli XCX: Brat Girl
programme.desc: Explore Charli XCX’s bold rise to fame—from mixtapes to pop stardom—always pushing the boundaries of sound.

programme.title: Chappell Roan: Your Favourite Artist
programme.desc: Explore Chappell Roan’s rise to fame as she redefines pop music--one glittery step at a time.

programme.title: Sabrina Carpenter: Short and Sweet
programme.desc: From child star to global entertainer, Sabrina Carpenter is reshaping the music industry. This is her story.

programme.title: The In Crowd
programme.desc: A woman joins a posh country club and falls for a clique led by a darkly secretive, twisted college student.

programme.title: Married to the Mob
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent falls in love with a recently widowed mafia wife seeking to start her life over.

programme.title: Still of the Night
programme.desc: A psychiatrist probes a patient's murder and falls for the victim's mysterious mistress. With Meryl Streep.

programme.title: Killing JFK: The Ultimate Conspiracy
programme.desc: An exploration of one of the most complex and unsolved mysteries, the assassination of JFK.

programme.title: Curse of the Kennedys
programme.desc: An examination of the countless tragedies and scandals that engulfed the Kennedy family.

programme.title: Scarface: The Al Capone Story
programme.desc: A look into the real Scarface, Alphonse Gabriel Capone, the most infamous gangster of all time.
